content: ## Get the data Select the **Execute step** button in the HTTP Request node window. The table view of the HTTP request results should look like this: This view should be familiar to you from the [Building a mini-workflow](/courses/level-one/chapter-2.md) page. This is the data from ABCorp's data warehouse that Nathan needs to work with. This data set includes sales information from 30 customers with five columns: - `orderID`: The unique id of each order. - `customerID`: The unique id of each customer. - `employeeName`: The name of Nathan's colleague responsible for the customer. - `orderPrice`: The total price of the customer's order. - `orderStatus`: Whether the customer's order status is `booked` or still in `processing`.
